browser-action.name: Select option Electric Power
browser-action.description:
Select an option from the html select element identified by the selector. You can specify several options if the select element has the 'multiple' attribute, or you can specify none to clear the selection.
Possible parameters are: - selector (required): The selector is a string that point to the elements in the page. Several types of selector are supported: Text, CSS, XPath... - options[0].text (optional): Select the option with a matching text. Multiple options can be selected by adding more parameters with a different index. - options[0].value (optional): Select the option with a matching index. Multiple options can be selected by adding more parameters with a different index. - options[0].index (optional): Select the option with a matching value. Multiple options can be selected by adding more parameters with a different index. - waitForNavigation (optional): Waits for the frame navigation. Default value is "false". - timeout (optional): Forces the timeout for that action in ms. - frameName (optional): Frame name
